booru.noPictures: Поиск по {{query}} не дал результатов. Попробуйте написать что-нибудь другое!
booru.maxTwo: Вы можете искать Danbooru максимум с двумя тегами!
booru.wrongChannel: you can only use this command in DM's or a NSFW channel!

common.ERROR: Произошла ошибка! Повторите попытку позже или отправьте отчет об ошибке.
common.ERROR_FULL: Произошла ошибка! Повторите попытку позже или отправьте отчет об ошибке.

common.NO_PERMS_BOT: Мне нужно разрешение {{perms}} для запуска этой команды!

menus.INPUT: Наберите номер своего выбора в чате или «{{cancel}}», чтобы отменить.

resolver.INSUFFICIENT_ARGS: Недостаточно аргументов - ожидается по крайней мере {{requiredArgs}}, получено {{argsCount}}

list.MIN: Длина {{arg}} не может содержать менее {{min}} элементов

role.NOT_FOUND: the role could not be found

group.NOT_FOUND: the command group could not be found

common.NO_PMS: Sorry, but I prefer a larger audience. (This command can't be run in PMs!)

companion.noPet: У вас еще нет компаньона! Используйте {{command}}, чтобы купить его!
companion.cannotAfford: Вам потребуется {{amount}} кредитов, но у вас есть только {{balance}}!
dialog: {{author}}, вы выбрали {{animal}} в качестве своего компаньона.
Вы уверены что хотите его приобрести за {{amount}} кредитов(/а)?
Чтобы подтвердить, напишите {{code}} или что-нибудь еще чтобы выйти.
companion.invalidCode: Вы ввели неверный код! Транзакция отменена.
companion.error: Произошла ошибка! Транзакция отменена. Попробуйте позже.
result: {{author}}, вы успешно приобрели {{animal}} в качестве своего компаньона.
Вы можете переименовать своего компаньона командой {{command}}.

errors.self: Вы не можете драться с самим собой!
errors.noUser: Этот пользователь не существует в моих записях!
errors.ongoingBattle: В этом канале уже идет сражение!
errors.opponentInBattle: Ваш противник в настоящее время сражается!
errors.noIncoming: У вас нет входящих запросов на битву.
errors.noOutgoing: Вы не отправили никаких запросов на битву.
errors.opponentNoCompanion: Этот игрок не не имеет компаньона!
errors.cantPlay: Вам нужно {{amount}} кредитов для игры, но у вас есть только {{balance}}!
errors.cantChallenge: У игрока недостаточно кредитов чтобы играть!
errors.noBattle: Этот канал не имеет продолжающихся сражений!
errors.notParticipating: Этот игрок не является участником этого сражения!
errors.isParticipant: Вы участник этой битвы и не можете делать ставки!
errors.cantBet: У вас недостаточно кредитов ({{balance}}), чтобы сделать ставку {{amount}}!
errors.betMulti: Вы не можете ставить больше одного раза!
errors.plsBetProperly: Вы не можете поставить менее одного кредита!
errors.notBetting: Битва не вошла в стадию ставок!
errors.afterBetting: Фаза ставок уже закончена для этой битвы!
errors.notOnline: Этот пользователь еще не в сети!

challenge: Вы бросили вызов {{mention}} в бой домашних животных!
У игрока есть {{time}} секунд чтобы реагировать с {{accept}} или {{reject}}. В противном случае они автоматически лишаются!
companion.bet: Вы разместили ставку {{amount}} кредитов на {{user}} и его компаньона {{pet}}!
companion.timedOut: {{p2}} не смог оттреагировать на вызов {{p1}} после {{time}} секунд и oн аннулирован.
companion.renameDialog: {{user}}, какое новое имя хотите дать своему питомцу {{pet}}?

HIT: {{p1}} administers a strong hit to {{p2}}, dealing {{dmg}} damage!
{{p1}} lands a strike on {{p2}}, who suffers {{dmg}} damage!
{{p2}} suffers a pounding by {{p1}}, who hits for {{dmg}} damage!
{{p1}} secures a good hit on {{p2}}, delivering {{dmg}} damage!
script.HIT_1: {{p1}} administers a strong hit to {{p2}}, dealing {{dmg}} damage!
script.HIT_3: {{p1}} lands a strike on {{p2}}, who suffers {{dmg}} damage!
script.HIT_4: {{p2}} suffers a pounding by {{p1}}, who hits for {{dmg}} damage!
script.HIT_5: {{p1}} secures a good hit on {{p2}}, delivering {{dmg}} damage!
script.HEAL_1: {{p1}} eats some medicine, raising his health by {{heal}}!
script.HEAL_2: {{p1}} uses a bandaid, healing by {{heal}} health!
script.HEAL_3: A wild fairy appeared, healing {{p1}} for {{heal}} health!
script.HEAL_4: {{p1}} discovers a magical paste, increasing his health by {{heal}}!

dialog: To confirm, enter {{code}} to proceed or {{exit}} to quit the menu.
confirmation: you have transferred {{amount}} credits to {{user}}'s account.
credits.invalidCode: you have entered an invalid code! Your credits haven't been transferred.
credits.selfSenderError: Вы не можете отправить кредиты себе!
credits.botUserError: Вы не можете отправлять кредиты ботам!

descriptions.contact: Report bugs, request features or leave feedback
descriptions.enable: Enable commands for a channel, user or role
descriptions.disable: Disable commands for a channel, user or role
descriptions.lang: Allows moderators to set a guild's language
descriptions.purge: Bulk delete messages from a channel
descriptions.repeat: Toggles repeat mode, where finished songs get re-added in the queue
descriptions.dice: Rolls some dice, using dice notation
descriptions.subscribe: Subscribes a channel to an event
descriptions.unsubscribe: Unsubscribes a channel from an event
descriptions.timezone: Allows moderators to set a guild's timezone
descriptions.reset: Resets all permission settings in a server
descriptions.welcome: Allows moderators to send welcome messages
descriptions.goodbye: Allows moderators to send goodbye messages
descriptions.multislots: Plays the slot machine with all 3 rows

join: 👋  Hello! I'm **haru**! Everyone's favourite idol ✨🎤 and part-time bot! 🤖
You can find a list of my commands by typing {{help}} into chat!
To learn more about me, use the {{about}} command!

ban.msg: you have swung the banhammer on {{member}}. May the Goddesses have mercy.
dialog: {{user}}, you are about to swing the banhammer on {{member}}.
To confirm, enter {{quote}} or {{exit}} to quit the menu.
ban.exitError: something wrong happened, so the member has **not** been banned.

kick.msg: {{member}} has been kicked. That felt good.
dialog: To confirm, enter {{quote}} or {{exit}} to quit the menu.
kick.exitError: something wrong happened, so the member has **not** been kicked.

help.header_1: To run a command, invoke it with {{prefix}} in {{server}}
help.header_2: To get more help on a command, call {{helpCommand}}
help.footer: For support, suggestions and feedback, visit {{link}}
footer_group: Omit `<>` or `[]` when invoking a command

images.wrongChannel: you can only use this command in DM's or a NSFW channel!

info: Everyone's favourite idol ✨🎤 and part-time bot! 🤖
invite: For suggestions and support, visit my server at {{server}}!
info.warn: Please ensure you have embeds enabled!
info.author: Author
info.join: For support, suggestions and feedback, visit {{link}}

music.dcInactive: Disconnected from voice channel due to inactivity.
music.clearQueue: The music queue has been cleared.

errors.notInChannel: bring me into a voice channel with {{command}} first!
emptyQueue: there is nothing in the queue!
Use the {{play}} command to queue a song!
errors.tooLong: that song is too long! Queue one shorter than 90 minutes.
errors.alreadyPlaying: there is already a song being played! Queue another song with {{command}}.
errors.notChannel: the current bound text channel is {{channel}}. Please use the music commands there.
errors.notFound: the video you provided could not be found.
errors.listNotFound: the playlist you provided could not be found.
errors.emptyPlaylist: the playlist you provided has no streamable videos.
errors.notInVoice: you need to be in a voice channel!
errors.alreadyBinded: I am already bound to {{text}}! Use commands in that channel.
errors.noPerms: I don't have the permissions to `connect` and/or `speak` in {{voice}}!
errors.error: something bad happened! Please try again later, or submit a bug report.
errors.notInSameVoice: you need to be in the voice channel {{channel}}!
errors.skipNotFound: the video specified could not be found.
errors.notReadyYet: The connection was not ready after 5 tries. Disconnected from voice channel.
errors.connError: A Discord error occurred while streaming to the channel: {{err}}

music.switch: Switching to streaming mode and playing from {{station}}
joinSuccess: Use the {{command}} command to start playing songs!
music.repeatOn: you have enabled repeat mode. All finished songs will be re-added to the back of the queue.
music.repeatOff: you have disabled repeat mode. All finished songs will not be re-added.
terminated: The bot is being restarted, all voice connections have been terminated.
The current queue has been saved in the database.
We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
music.votedSkip: you have already voted to skip this song!
music.voteSkipSuccess: you have voted to skip the current song!
music.votedClear: you have already voted to clear the queue!
music.voteClearSuccess: you have voted to clear the current queue!

insufficient: You can use the command {{command}} to claim free credits every few hours!
slots.won: {{user}} placed a bet of {{amount}} credits and won:
slots.lost: {{user}} placed a bet of {{amount}} credits and lost all of it.
slots.yudodis: you can't bet less than one credit!
slots.dailyLimit: you have reached the daily limit of credits that can be won. Try again in {{time}}.

prefix.success: successfully changed this guild's prefix to {{prefix}}
prefix.revert: reverted this guild's prefix back to {{prefix}}
prefix.current: the current prefix for this server is: {{prefix}}

lang.success: successfully changed this guild's language to {{lang}}

tz.success: successfully changed this guild's timezone to {{tz}}
notFound: Visit {{link}} for a list of valid timezone codes.
tz.current: the current timezone for this server is: {{tz}}

eventNotFound: the event {{event}} could not be found.
subscribe.notSubscribed: {{channel}} is not subscribed to any events.

reset.success: reset all permission settings in the server.

action.enable: Use this channel to send welcome messages

setDialog: {{author}}, please enter the new welcome message.
To use a tag, surround it with `{{}}`. E.g. `{{guild}}`

action.enable: Use this channel to send goodbye messages

setDialog: {{author}}, please enter the new goodbye message.
To use a tag, surround it with `{{}}`. E.g. `{{guild}}`

autorole.success: Successfully configured {{role}} as this server autorole
autorole.none: There is no autorole on this server
autorole.current: The current autorole for this server is {{role}}

purge.filterSuccess: purged {{num}} messages matching the following criteria: {{criteria}}

rss.success: added feed for {{channel}} with {{included}} included tags and {{excluded}} excluded tags: {{url}}
rss.error: could not validate {{url}}. Please check if it's a valid RSS feed.
rss.rssDelFooter: Enter the number of the RSS feed you would like to remove, or {{cancel}} to exit.
urlDialog: {{author}}, please enter the URL of the RSS feed you would like to add.
includedTagsDialog: {{author}}, please enter a list of included tags, separated by commas. For example: `films, science`
Otherwise, enter {{skip}} to skip, or {{exit}} to exit.
excludedTagsDialog: {{author}}, please enter a list of excluded tags, separated by commas. For example: `anime, religion`
Otherwise, enter {{skip}} to skip, or {{exit}} to exit.
rss.subscribedTo: {{channel}} is subscribed to the following RSS feeds:
rss.notSubscribed: {{channel}} is not subscribed to any feed. Use {{command}} to add a new feed.
rss.noFeedFound: there was no feed found with that name or URL.
confirmClear: {{author}}, are you sure you want to clear all RSS feeds?
Enter {{confirm}} to confirm, or anything else to exit.
rss.cleared: {{count}} RSS feeds were removed from this channel.

action.add: Add an RSS feed to the channel
action.remove: Remove an RSS feed from the channel
action.list: List all RSS feeds added in this channel
action.clear: Clears all RSS feeds added in this channel
